gw.bizrules.pcf

Class ImportingRulesDisposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.bizrules.pcf.ImportingRulesDisposition

  • public class ImportingRulesDisposition
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for RuleImportDetailsPopup.pcf Calculates aggregated statistics for a rule import task and provides filters for it.
